[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Wind Turbine Monitoring System (WTMS) defines requirements for real-time monitoring, fault detection, predictive maintenance, and operational efficiency to maximize wind energy output.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: WTMS enables turbine data acquisition, condition monitoring, integration with SCADA for optimized performance, and predictive analytics for grid stability.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: WTMS integrates with SCADA, turbine sensors, and weather data sources.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: WTMS provides dashboards and reporting tools for operators and maintenance teams.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: WTMS operates on industrial servers and turbine monitoring equipment.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: WTMS supports REST APIs for SCADA integration and analytics.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: WTMS optimizes storage for high-frequency sensor data.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: WTMS runs continuously with automated updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: WTMS configures for different turbine models and conditions.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: WTMS connects to predictive analytics and grid management services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 MISSING-TAG2: WTMS ensures secure data transmission using industry protocols.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: WTMS enables real-time monitoring, fault detection, and predictive analytics.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: Designed for turbine operators, maintenance engineers, and wind farm managers.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: WTMS requires SCADA integration, turbine sensors, and weather data.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: SCADA: Control system for industrial automation.
[SUBSEC] 1.9 Acronyms and Abbreviations: SCADA: Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition
NERC: North American Electric Reliability Corporation
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 MISSING-TAG1: WTMS depends on stable communication and functional SCADA sensors.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with SCADA systems for turbine data acquisition.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall connect to weather services for analysis.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall monitor turbine health metrics like vibration and temperature (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall generate anomaly alerts and corrective actions (REQ-DB-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide customizable dashboards and support multilingual functionality.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process turbine data within 2 seconds.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall handle 5,000 turbines concurrently.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The database shall store turbine performance data for 5 years.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The database shall support role-based access.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to IEC 61400 standards for wind turbines and comply with GDPR for data privacy.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall scale dynamically during high data traffic periods.
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall log critical actions for auditing.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall follow modular design for scalability.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-DSGN-002: The software shall comply with ISO 27001 for security.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Validates monitoring, fault detection, and compliance with IEC 61400 and GDPR.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Includes guides, manuals, and training materials.
[SEC] 5. References: IEC 61400 standards, ISO 27001 guidelines, and SCADA manuals.
